tool_description: Linguakit API (formerly CilenisAPI) helps you to analyze and extract information from texts. Add language technology to your software in a few minutes using our cloud solution. We offer you technology based on years of research in Natural Language Processing in a very easy and scalable SaaS model trough a RESTful API.
name: Linguakit - Natural Language Processing in the cloud
title: Linguakit - Natural Language Processing in the cloud
tool_name: Linguakit - Natural Language Processing in the cloud

api_list.name: Language Identifier
api_list.description: Recognizes the language in which a text is written. This module can distinguish several languages using language models and morphological structures.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field.
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

api_list.name: Keyword Extractor
api_list.description: It extracts the most relevant words from a text and ranks them according to their degree of relevance. For Spanish, English, Galician, and Portuguese.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en

api_list.name: Syntactic analyzer
api_list.description: Gives the syntactic struture of a text using a dependency-based parser: DepPattern. All words of a text are structured in binary relations (dependencies). For Spanish, English, Galician, and Portuguese.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Code: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician
required_parameters.default: en

required_parameters.name: output_type
required_parameters.description: Type of output. Code (-a) Analyser, (-fa) Analyser with full representation, (-c) Corrector, (-conll) CoNLL
required_parameters.default: -a

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: This is the text you are goint to analyze or extract information.
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

api_list.name: Named Entity Recognizer
api_list.description: It extracts from a text Named Entities and classify them as persons, places, organizations, and miscelaneous.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: If the input text is inside a website, like an article in a blog, you can insert the url in this field instead the input text above

api_list.name: Triples Extractor
api_list.description: It extracts triples relations: OBJECT1 RELATION OBJECT2

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Code: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician
required_parameters.default: en

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: This is the text you are goint to analyze or extract information.
optional_parameters.default: Type or paste here the text you want to analyze

api_list.name: Summarizer
api_list.description: Create a summary or abstract from a text. You chouse the percentage of the summary: 10% abstract or 50% long summary.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text of the module
required_parameters.default: Insert the text here to be summarized.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en

optional_parameters.name: output_size
optional_parameters.description: The percentage of the output text. 20 means the summary will be composed by 20% of the sentences of the original text.

api_list.name: Verb Conjugator
api_list.description: Returns the inflection of a verb, even verbs that don't exist, using the rules to conjugate it. For Galician, Spanish and Portuguese.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Verb infinitive (Examples: tener (spanish), fazer (portuguese), facer (galician) )
required_parameters.default: Insert here the verb to be conjugated.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: gl

optional_parameters.name: variety
optional_parameters.description: Only applies for portuguese. Language variety: pt_pt - "Eropeu com acordo ortográfico", pt_br "Brasileiro com Acordo Ortográfico", pt_pt_sao "Europeu sem Acordo Ortográfico" e pt_br_sao "Brasileiro sem Acordo Ortográfico"

api_list.name: Tokenizer
api_list.description: Splits a text into words and phrases, including ambiguous separators like dots and colons.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en

api_list.name: Web Text Extractor
api_list.description: It extracts from a url the relevant text of the web. In a newspaper, it extract the article.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Website to extract the main text
required_parameters.default: Insert here the web to be extracted.

api_list.name: Multiword extractor
api_list.description: It extracts the most relevant multiword terms from a text and ranked according to their degree of internal cohesion, for example: “mortgage rates”, “house price”, “building societies”, “price war”. For Spanish, English, Galician, and Portuguese.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en

api_list.name: Sentiment Analyzer
api_list.description: It tells you whether it thinks the text you enter expresses positive sentiment, negative sentiment, or if it's neutral. It also gives you a quantitative weight of how intense is the sentiment. For Spanish, English, and Portuguese.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en

api_list.name: Part of Speech Tagger
api_list.description: I analyzes a text with by providing words with Part of Speech tags (e.g., noun, verb, preposition...), morphological features (singular, masculine...), and their lemmas (canonical form). For Spanish, English, Galician, and Portuguese.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The input text for the module. This module will process the text you introduce in this field
required_parameters.default: Insert here the text to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Codes: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician. Use: en, es, pt or gl
required_parameters.default: en
